creditline: Anonymous gift in memory of Kenji Nakahashi and in honor of Robert Cozzolino
description: abstract image; two black squares with grey circles in center; purple and blue lozenge shape with wavy edges between squares; blue and brown shaded section with vertical wavy lines below lozenge, with pink line beneath; geometric sketches in pencil and purple colored pencil at bottom; drawn on scratch paper--typewritten numbers visible on back
medium: Colored pencil and graphite pencil on paper
signed: LLQ in pencil: Untitled | LRQ in pencil: K Nakahashi
title: Untitled
